item.title: Falling in Love With Rust
item.description: “It may seem difficult at first but everything is difficult at first” Miyamoto Musashi Falling in Love With Rustlang Occasionally a candidate says, “I’ve heard Amazon can be a really hard place to work. Some people thrive and some people fail. Why is that, and how can I avoid joining the ranks of those who fail?” This is a great question. I have heard a variation of this statement at Amazon dozens of times over the years:
